title: Enthaaraa Enthaaraa Lyrics Thirumanam Ennum Nikkah Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Enthaaraa Enthaaraa
Singers: Shadab Faridi, Chinmayi
Music: M.Ghibran
Movie: Thirumanam Ennum Nikkah
Lyrics: Karthik Netha

Enthaaaraa enthaaraa neeye en thaaraa
enmanam poothadhey thaaraa..
kanpooraa kanpooraa neeye thaan thaaraa
kannaaraak kaangiren thaaraa.

Thanneerai poosikondu mella chellum
pinbangal nee aaggiraai, adhire,,
ennodu kadhal vandhu, enna solla
yekkangal pesudhey.

Unthaara unthaara naaney un thaaraa.
en vaanam pothadhey seeraa..
kanpooraa kanpooraa neeye than veeraa.
en paarvai aandhey kooraaa..

Kanneerai poosikondu mella chellum
pinbangal nee aaggiraai, adhire,,
ennodu kadhal vandhu, enna solla
vekkangal pesudhey.

Yeno indru yeno
naan undhan naano...
neeya illai naaanaaa..
naam ennum naamo..

Thoondilaaa nee oonjalaa
thooralaa nee kaanalaaa
kaththeegam mounam nee kondu vandhaai
illaadhal oru, illaadha peril
nam kadhal vazhumey
hoi .. nam kadhal vazhumey..

un dhisaigalalai padapadavena thandhaai
minminigalai un vizhigalai kondaai
kanimigalil un iravainai
katha kathapudan thandhaai
kannaviley nizhavoli thandhaai.

Bramanda kaalam nee thandhu sendraai
ennaatkal theerndhadhey..

Enthaaaraa enthaaraa neeye en thaaraa
enmanam poothadhey thaaraa..
kanpooraa kanpooraa neeye thaan thaaraa
kannaaraak kaangiren thaaraa.

Thanneerai poosikondu mella chellum
pinbangal nee aaggiraai, adhire,,
ennodu kadhal vandhu, enna solla
yekkangal pesudhey.
